Package com.tiberiuslabs.BattleChess.Gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GuiBoard
    Holds the individual tiles
    HelpWindow
    popup windows to display the rules and play info
    MainWindow
    Main interface for the whole program
    Menu
    Holds the interface for the program menu
    PlayerInfo
    Displays the game state information relevant to the player

    player/AI score player/AI units in the graveyard misc things that may come up

    Tile
    Holds interface state of the tile what color tile it should be which unit portrait should be displayed, if any whether/how it is highlighted Also is the origin of the mouse click events
